about_the_game:
"Bookworm Maid" is now compatible with the following content added in "CUSTOM ORDER MAID 3D2 It's a Night Magic + GP02."

1.Become even more intimate with your maid with the marriage system!
After fulfilling the requirements such as likability at the facility "Cathedral," you will be able to proceed from the "lover" relationship to "bride" with your maid.

2.Private maid mode
See one of your favorite maids in a variety of everyday scenes and enjoy the conversations and life around the Empire Club!

3.Empire life mode
New events are added to Empire life mode.

content_descriptors.notes:
This game contains adult content intended for individuals 18 years of age or older.
It includes nudity, sex scene, and blatantly sexual imagery, as well as imagery that has sexual implications.
If you are not yet 18+ or if you are accessing from any country or located where adult material is specifically prohibited by law, do not play this game.

1.Become even more intimate with your maid with the marriage system!

2.Private maid mode
See one of your favorite maids in a variety of everyday scenes and enjoy the conversations and life around the Empire Club!

3.Empire life mode
